attributes.action: Prioritise frontline healthcare workers for the Covid vaccine.
attributes.additional_details:
NHS workers & have worked tirelessly in unrelenting & stressful conditions most of us can't even imagine, to protect & save lives in an unprecedented year.

They are not currently prioritised in the vaccine roll-out and with staff morale depleted (and hundreds of their lives lost in the first wave) it's crucial that we put their safety first - and in turn enable them to continue to do their amazing work.
attributes.background: Make the vaccine available to all frontline healthcare workers and hospital staff to keep them safe.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Frontline health workers are already in the second priority group, after care homes. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/priority-groups-for-coronavirus-covid-19-vaccination-advice-from-the-jcvi-2-december-2020/priority-groups-for-coronavirus-covid-19-vaccination-advice-from-the-jcvi-2-december-2020
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
